channel.title: I need help with my sever
channel.description: ok look i have 3 quiestions 1 is that your sever thing work online? 2 how do i add the burrows chest? 3 how do i add the pest control trader (the guy who gives you stuff for points) thats it thanks

item.title: I need help with my sever
item.dc:creator: @bigcasey123 bigcasey123
item.description:
@bigcasey123 wrote:

ok im now getting mad all i want is for some1 to try my sever to see if it works online but i get in trouble and no one else will try my sever on other sites

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with my sever

item.title: I need help with my sever
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

It probably does work, just you probably haven’t done anything related to setting the server up.

1.) Downloading JRE (you should have this if you play RuneScape.) and JDK (this is required)
2.) Setting up environmental variables.
3.) Port forwarding.
4.) Editting .bat files to match your JDK
OPTIONAL:
5.) Setting up a no-ip to allow other players to join.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with my sever

item.title: I need help with my sever

ok so this does work online right thats all that bothers me

item.source: I need help with my sever

item.title: I need help with my sever
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

bigcasey123:

ok look i have 3 quiestions 1 is that your sever thing work online? 2 how do i add the burrows chest? 3 how do i add the pest control trader (the guy who gives you stuff for points) thats it thanks

  1. Use a better source.
  2. Read ALL of this. Do it. It helps. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,193370.0.html
  3. You don’t need a no-ip to connect, you just need it for other players to connect.
  4. Use localhost 127.0.0.1

As for adding “Barrows”, you’ll need to code that yourself or [size=1pt]leech[/size] from other private server websites.
Same goes for Pest Control.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with my sever
